website_summaries.verdict: If you have a lot of space to mop, this option works well and makes dusting your floors easy.
pros: Can be used on a variety of floors including polished concrete and tile
This is a large 36-inch size, but this mop also comes in smaller widths
cons: Unlike the microfiber mops, this one is designed to be used with some kind of chemical cleaner

customer_reviews.title: Pick up dig fur well
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my dust mop a couple weeks ago. Great for use on my HW floors, it picks up a huge amount of dog fur. Maneuvering takes slight getting use to, but its easy to use . My only compaint is that now I am finding the blue strings from the duster around the house. So I'm not sure how good the quality is? It's brand new and has not even been through the wash yet. I hope my cats don't eat or we will have a huge problem. I chose to spend the extra money on a nicer one so I didnt expect to loose the string so soon.
customer_reviews.author: CS2017

customer_reviews.title: No handle....no problem
customer_reviews.text: My mop arrived without a handle, but I called Nine Forty and Kurt shipped out a new one very quickly. He also writes handwritten notes - nice to have excellent and personalized customer service these days. And oh, the mop works awesome on my hardwood floors. Love how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: John Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Will outlive me
customer_reviews.text: This is a big boy! We just moved from 1000 square feet to 4800. I can sweep the entire downstairs in one or two minutes with this thing. Heavy enough to get all the dust, crumbs, etc on one pass. It will be larger and heavier than you think, but that’s a plus in my view.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Great mop.  Doesn't get as much dust as I thought it might. Be careful on the sharp metal clamp end!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, assemble it and ran it over our large tile and hardwood floors, and it does a pretty good job. It did several hundred sq. feet of floor in under 2 minutes! Of course I was a deck Navy sailor, so that makes me a real pro! Watch out for the near razor sharp edges when you use your fingers to operate the joining clamp to the mop! I'll file them down and all will be well. Well made, and very easy to assemble. Practically no time to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kitsko

customer_reviews.title: A big time saver, but you need somewhere to shake it clean.
customer_reviews.text: A great dust mop for my whole hom tile plank flooring. It picks up a ton of dog hair and sand, but since I have nowhere to shake this out properly, I have to vacuum the pad off between washings.
customer_reviews.author: Cyburbs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for pet hair! Just what I needed to do a quick sweep of the floors. My dog sheds like you wouldn’t believe and I can not stand feeling the hair under my slippers! And the size is prefect! Plenty large but easy to maneuver to get the smaller areas. I still haven’t figured out a good way to clean it with all of the dog hair trapped on it. I don’t really want to put that through my washing machine but I’m thinking a good shake and power washer or hose will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for a large area. It was super easy to assemble and the dust mop is really great. I like the way it can be adjusted and it is very maneuverable for such a large mop.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Design. Almost impossible to even use.
customer_reviews.text: So we purchased this for our hardwood floors to help clean up puppy hair and little bits they bring inside. It's almost impossible to use, doesn't maneuver at all. If you twist to go around an object it sometimes comes undone from the mop head. If we could return it we would. I would not recommend this anyone. Just taking up space in our closet now as we can't use it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stone

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: My house is mostly tile and sweeping is no longer a chore... It's more like a proud Dad moment, where I show off how quickly and efficiently I can clean my floors!
customer_reviews.author: Derrek

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all! Love the dust mop for our tile/wood floors. This seems to work great with no complaints when using it. Love that it comes with a handwritten note in the box which makes me think of small buisness, personable service and quality. Great buy in my opinion. The telescoping pole is great for reaching under the couches. Only complaint was the pole where it clips on the mop head. Perhaps a slightly stronger spring on this part would be good. Overall an amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lucio

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Very light i am a custodian And needed this i Was very impressed on how light it is and Adjustable seeing I am only 4 '11😉
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Ledingham

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Mops received are cheaper than those purchased in physical stores and do not need to be washed by hand. They are very easy to use. The mopping effect is good and there is no residue. Hair and the like are also cleaned relatively clean, and the ground can be dragged very clean. To clean the mop, you only need to pull back and forth several times to dehydrate and completely say goodbye to bending over.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia S Visitacion

customer_reviews.title: 36” is bigger than you expect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our vinyl laminate floors. Ordered the 36” and it’s pretty big for a normal-sized house, but it’s efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and a nice size at 36”. Would buy again! If I needed to, this thing is well built.
customer_reviews.author: junior22

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to mop our shop so we didn't create so much dust. It works great!!! Its exactly what we hoped for!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very practical mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop is really good, compact and light, easy to carry, and does not take up space, the texture of the external bucket is very good, right-angle design even kick the dead corner of the line can be very clean, up and down to push and pull automatically dry, dirt is squeezed out of the mop, mop floor can become very easy, very worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Rudolf  Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Do not use of hard wood flooring!!
customer_reviews.text: This item has a piece of metal right in the middle of the mop which scratches my hard wood floors. Do not purchase one if you are planning on using this product on hard wood.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Walker

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This item was more of a mess than helpful. Strands of the mop fell off all over my wood floors. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JHoff

customer_reviews.title: Picks up dog hair quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It swivels into narrow tight places. It can sweep across your whole living room floor quickly. We have a German Shepard that sheds lots of hair. Picks it all up with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Serota

customer_reviews.title: Industrial means Faster Clean-up for Floors
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to keep wood floors free of pet hair
customer_reviews.author: OBXSCAPE

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing cleans the garage in 60 seconds. It’s a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love it love the adjustable handle very easy to put together. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Richard fergison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and quality, it’s definitely professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: So good I made a video of it
customer_reviews.text: Great dust mop. I passed on it when we moved in 6 months ago but the cheaper one I went with already has to be replaced. The quality of the handle lets you know what you're dealing with. The maneuverability is top notch. Buy it. I made a video review of it in one take to send to my mother in law, she will be ordering it shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kel

customer_reviews.title: Never really post reviews but....
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my sanity... we have a dog that sheds very little and it’s hard to pick up with a regular broom... the commercial size sweeper does the job!’ Plus points for the manufacturer... needed to get a stick replacement and they took care of it immediately!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Luna

customer_reviews.title: Handles well
customer_reviews.text: First we got the handle wouldn’t telescope. Amazon issued a return shipping label no problem and we ordered a replacement. Great mop!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.text: First couple times was awesome till the handle seems to not want to work anymore It’s now sucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mop that is well made
customer_reviews.text: This unit is made well and is the perfect size for mopping a basketball floor with a wet towel. The larger units start twisting and become unwieldy.
customer_reviews.author: Bitti

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! Makes it much faster to clean!
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Great dust mop! Large extension handle. Very nice product. It only came with one head, so if you want additional heads you will have to buy seperately.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect size and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: We have used the "Nine Forty" several times on a new tile floor in a fellowship hall. It is a perfect size and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent on Tile Floors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Daughter because I have one which I use on my wood floors and she has Tile floors in her New Home. I just knew that she would like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our big living room. Picks up dust and hair rather well.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Came a day earlier with a nice note on the instruction. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: cat vag

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: the king of all push brooms. This thing is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Rodola

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny if you have dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works great even for dog hair. Only thing keeping it from being perfect is if it had some space age material that caused it to never be cleaned. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Chad Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Quick to put together and put to work. Works great on our shop floor
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and big so the floor doesn't take so long!
customer_reviews.author: Candace B.

customer_reviews.title: and I have an older dog that is shedding like crazy right now
customer_reviews.text: Add some Endust and this thing is magical. I have a large living room floor with large floor tiles... and I have an older dog that is shedding like crazy right now... and the hair is everywhere. This has really shortened my floor cleaning time significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop
customer_reviews.text: Great mop. Feels sturdy and makes quick work of large areas
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilderman

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome on our wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome on our wood floors. We have all wood laminate floors throughout the house and this duster does the job great with less work. Buy the spray to help even more picking up the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rabin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Worth Every Penny !!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted Floor Mop, so she can reduce using Vacuum Cleaner but still can clean floor Daily. Came across this Product and Reviews were pretty good and bought one. Here are my takes. - Product is very Sturdy and seems Reliable - Easy to Assemble - Wide Cleaning are makes job quicker to clean Floor - Quality Material and feels Long Lasting - Most imp, my wife loves it as it's exactly as described in listing - Best for the price it's offered for I would recommend this to my family and friends !! Thank you Amazon !!
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Patel

customer_reviews.title: so I needed something like this. It seems very well made and was ...
customer_reviews.text: This mop has just arrived and it took about ten seconds to put together. I have a very large house with no carpet, so I needed something like this. It seems very well made and was like driving a toy around. Once I stated using it, I was like a little kid with a remote controlled car. It made dusting the floors very easy and fun. Sounds nuts, but true. The note from one of the people at the company that made the mop was very nice. Thanks Kurt.
customer_reviews.author: xxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I did but the suggested spray . After polishing the floor, this works great for upkeep & cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quick cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 dogs and one of them is a Husky. With our new hardwood floors I wanted to find something that would keep them looking great. This dust mop is super easy to use and makes maintaining our floors a breeze!. Also, when it arrived, the handle would not extend. I contacted customer service and they sent me a new handle that arrived in 3 days, no questions asked!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchase this to clean our laminate floors and we have been very pleased with it. The whole thing went together in less than a minute. It is super easy to use and the 24" head fits well under tables, couches, etc. The swivel works very well, the handle extends well past my height and the whole thing seems pretty sturdy. If you use it every day or two, dirt and dog hair don't build up and it only takes a few minutes each time -- the nylon works much better than I expected and I won't be purchasing a cotton mop head after all. And the personal note from Kurt is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: This neat freak says, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Only suggestion is an instruction how to slide the plastic retainer that allows it to swivel. It's a bit high, it doesn't go under one piece of furniture as did my old one—part of the spring-loaded connector is too high. Otherwise, it's obviously an excellent quality mop and handle. Kurt (seller) includes a warranty registration card but it requires a stamp. I would like to have the card read: "Your personal data will not be given, sold, or shared with others." Or, an option to register online.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrith H. King

customer_reviews.title: Completely Unusable
customer_reviews.text: This product is worthless. The mop head and handle are what I ordered (24”) but the bracket is the wrong size (36”) making this a huge waste of money. Item says it is not eligible for return so I am hoping this gets the sellers attention ASAP. I have new floors that I need to clean so now I have to go buy ANOTHER item so I can clean my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrass Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sweeping success
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dust mop! While, I think it's (36") probably too wide for most applications, it works great if you've got a large area to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Travis V.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dust mop. My whole 1965 sq. ft. house has lamanet floors and I needed something I could move around the house quickly that covered a lot of area. The one does the trick and it does a great job of picking up dirt. I would not be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L. Cerone

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps the competition
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and maneuvers with ease. Seems to be made well. I like that it has snaps instead of velcro. I love the adjustable handle!! It should wash well too. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: jasonswifey

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff Nine Forty!
customer_reviews.text: VERY HIGH QUALITY!!!! I use this to dust my hardwood floors - had a slight issue with a rod not being delivered, but the company worked with me to send out the rod no issues whatsoever. Very nice people and great item.
customer_reviews.author: A Medzi

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. The customer service is impeccable. When I recieved my broom the white part on the handle that allows maneuverability broke after the first use, I sent an email and the next day they sent me a new handle out.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the quick shipment and good price Very good product Use it on our aircraft hangar floor
customer_reviews.author: Lothar

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and built well. I use it to clean my garage floor and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Neil Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: As expected but no swivel for tight turns. Not really an issue
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lakin

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's ok,the strings keep falling off everytime I use it even if it's just a little
customer_reviews.author: david gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product - efficient
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good quality. Comes with a one-year warranty but I didn’t need it.
customer_reviews.author: O.A.

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I need the head or board the fits in handle and mop.i thought it would come with handle and mop. It's useless this way Spoke to Kurt from company and received missing part and mop works great on hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Really works well. I use it daily to clean up after 1 year old has meals.
customer_reviews.author: Ava’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: A high quality prouct
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: Great broom for big areas!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for what it is needed for. We used in residential home for our tile floors. Needed one size down but still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dust mop
customer_reviews.text: This dust mop is used every day in our business. Does a fine job of picking up the fine dust. The head is large enough the cover a large space and small enough to still get​ the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle Solberg

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Dust mop two footer is awesome extension handle is perfect
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Works great, well made
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something like they use to clean basketball courts at schools. This definitely fits the bill. Works great and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bravoking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dust mop. Holds on to stuff well and there are no problems I can sweep all the hardwood floors in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job, we happen to use it in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job, we happen to use it in our warehouse on a smooth cement floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: This one is the keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few brooms for my new hardwood floor. This one is the keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Kreuznacher

customer_reviews.title: Seller awesome. This is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Seller awesome. This is exactly what I needed. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barefield

customer_reviews.title: Good high quality mop!
customer_reviews.text: Update to my previous review! This is a very good mop and works well for our coated floor. I had noted that the mop did not swivel in my past review. I did not know there was a plastic lock at the mop head connection. Unlocked it and it swivels fine!
customer_reviews.author: Lao Wai

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for a shop floor or something different may be great, just not for what I was thinking
customer_reviews.text: Really scratchy and not much for sweeping a hardwood floor. Maybe for a shop floor or something different may be great, just not for what I was thinking. So used as part of a halloween Smurf costume. Worked good for that!
customer_reviews.author: outside not in

product_meta.title: Nine Forty Residential | Commercial 36 Inch Janitorial USA Floor Dry Dust Mop Broom Set | Handle
product_meta.description: Size:36" X 5"This Complete Kit Includes a 36 Inch Dust Mop, Steel Frame, and Aluminum Extension Handle. The Dust Mop is Made in the USA From High Quality Nylon Yarn Which Builds Static Charge to Attract Dust and Dirt Particles. The Ergonomic Quick Change Head on the Handle Allows the Frame to Rotate 360 Degrees Providing Maneuverability in Hard to Reach Places. While Remaining Light Weight the Aluminum Telescoping Handle Ranges from 42" to 72" Long; Allowing it to Reach Under Objects or Adjust to Various User Heights.
feature_bullets: Floor Mop Head is hand sewn in the USA from High Quality Nylon Yarn Which Builds Static Charge to Attract Dust and Dirt Particles; use as a wood floor dry mop daily to quickly collect dust, dirt, pet hair, etc
Great mops for floor cleaning on Industrial | Commercial | Residential Surfaces including hardwood floors; Heavy Duty Stitching Extends Mop Life, Improves Cleaning Performance and Launderability
36 Inch Wide Dust Mop Broom Quick Change Head is Ergonomically Designed to allow the Frame to Rotate 360 Degrees; Provides Maneuverability in Hard to Reach Places
Aluminum Dust Mop Handle Telescopes Ranges from 42" to 72" Long; Allowing it to Reach Under Objects or Adjust to Various User Heights

Wood Floor Mop | We recommend checking with your manufacturer before choosing between Nylon or Natural Cotton; with increased durability Nylon can be repeatedly machine washed, while soft to touch it is slightly more coarse than natural cotton
